verses.verse: For Zion's <S%H4616>sake<s%> I will not <S%H2814>keep<s%> <S%H2814>silent,<s%> And for Jerusalem's <S%H4616>sake<s%> I will not <S%H8252>keep<s%> <S%H8252>quiet,<s%> <S%H5704>Until<s%> her <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> <S%H3318>goes<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> like <S%H5051>brightness,<s%> And her <S%H3444>salvation<s%> like a <S%H3940>torch<s%> that is <S%H1197>burning.<s%>

And the <S%H1471>nations<s%> will <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> your <S%H9202>glory;<s%> And you will be <S%H7121>called<s%> by a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H834>Which<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H9344>designate.<s%>

You will also be a <S%H5850>crown<s%> of <S%H8597>beauty<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And a <S%H4410>royal<s%> <S%H6797>diadem<s%> in the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of your <S%H430>God.<s%>

It will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> be <S%H559>said<s%> to you, <S%H5800>"Forsaken,<s%>" <S%H3808>Nor<s%> to your <S%H776>land<s%> will it <S%H5750>any<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> be <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8077>"Desolate<s%>"; But you will be <S%H7121>called,<s%> "My <S%H2656>delight<s%> is in her," And your <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H1166>"Married<s%>"; For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2654>delights<s%> in you, And [to Him] your <S%H776>land<s%> will be <S%H1166>married.<s%>

For [as] a <S%H970>young<s%> <S%H970>man<s%> <S%H1166>marries<s%> a <S%H1330>virgin,<s%> [So] your <S%H1121>sons<s%> will <S%H1166>marry<s%> you; And [as] the <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%> <S%H4885>rejoices<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3618>bride,<s%> [So] your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you.

On your <S%H2346>walls,<s%> O <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> I have <S%H6485>appointed<s%> <S%H8104>watchmen;<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> they will <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H2814>keep<s%> <S%H2814>silent.<s%> You who <S%H2142>remind<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> take <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H1824>rest<s%> for yourselves;
And <S%H5414>give<s%> Him <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H1824>rest<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> He <S%H3559>establishes<s%> And <S%H7760>makes<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> a <S%H8416>praise<s%> in the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by His <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> and by His <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H2220>arm,<s%> "I will <S%H518>never<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H1715>grain<s%> [as] <S%H3978>food<s%> for your <S%H340>enemies;<s%> <S%H518>Nor<s%> will <S%H1121>foreigners<s%> <S%H5236><s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> your <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine,<s%> for <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H3021>labored.<s%>"

But those who <S%H622>garner<s%> it will <S%H398>eat<s%> it, and <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> And those who <S%H6908>gather<s%> it will <S%H8354>drink<s%> it in the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of My <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>

<S%H5674>Go<s%> <S%H5674>through,<s%> <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H8179>gates;<s%> <S%H6437>Clear<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> for the <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H5549>Build<s%> up, <S%H5549>build<s%> up the <S%H4546>highway;<s%> <S%H5619>Remove<s%> the <S%H68>stones,<s%> <S%H7311>lift<s%> up a <S%H5251>standard<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H8085>proclaimed<s%> to the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H559>Say<s%> to the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> <S%H2009>"Lo,<s%> your <S%H3468>salvation<s%> <S%H935>comes;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> His <S%H7939>reward<s%> is with Him, and His <S%H6468>recompense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Him."

And they will <S%H7121>call<s%> them, "The <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> The <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>"; And you will be <S%H7121>called,<s%> <S%H1875>"Sought<s%> out, a <S%H5892>city<s%> not <S%H5800>forsaken.<s%>"
